name: easbase

scripts.dev: npm run build:packages && npm run dev:web
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=@easbase/core --if-present && npm run build --workspace=@easbase/sdk --if-present
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=@easbase/web
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=@easbase/web
scripts.vercel-build: npm run build:packages && cd apps/web && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:api && npm run test:e2e
scripts.monitor: npm run health && npm run test:api
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build

description: AI-powered backend infrastructure for modern applications
